text: 3. Look at the third recursive call you marked. What is the rank of 11 in this array? How does this relate to 11’s rank in the second recursive call, and why? 4. If you're looking for the element of rank 42 (i.e., the 42nd largest element) in an array of 100 elements, and Greater has 41 elements, where is the element you’re looking for? 5. How could you determine before making QuickSort’s recursive calls whether the element of rank k is the pivot or appears in Lesser or Greater?
